p: Relationship: Dr. Tocchetti has a Canadian Patent No. 2,613,477, issued on December 3, 2013 Inventors: Nazareno Paolocci, David A Kass, Carlo G Tocchetti. Owner: Johns Hopkins University Entitled: THIOL‐SENSITIVE POSITIVE INOTROPES JHU Ref.: C04755‐P04755‐05 with royalties paid. No other relationships/conditions/circumstances that present a potential conflict of interest.
